creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: small oval print; grove of trees with bare forest floor; thick foliage in background
inscription:
-- in graphite on mount that print is affixed to: 3FF | 87o 264 | L. Guy | OLW
-- in graphite on back of mount: APG 9143
provenance: [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until November 10, 1987; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Study of Woods
